title: Q4 - How does DPDPA interact with existing Indian laws (IT Act, RBI, IRDAI, SEBI, etc.)?
description: DPDPA is a horizontal law — it applies to all sectors, while sector regulators continue to enforce vertical laws.

previous.title: Q3 - Do small businesses and start-ups also need to comply, or only big companies?
